script.line: What the-- Minty reversed the Spiky Plex! I didn't... I didn't even think that was a thing!
Bark bark!
Oh no, oh no. What if... what if I'm not good at what I do? What if I chose the wrong path?
The cards were wrong! I'm a failure!
No... Fear not, Spiked Jonathan.
Yung Sphinx! You're back!
I am back. And I can reassure you...
THE FUTURE IS GLORIOUS.
...Who's this little cat?
This is my friend Yung Sphinx.
And I am here to help. You are lost, Spiky Jon. You do not know the way...
Yeah, sounds like me.
You seek comfort. You seek knowledge. You seek...
PROPHECY!
How did you know?!
I am the Young Sphinx. Now hear me:
You have made the right choice. You know your path ahead. Banish uncertainty.
AND TAKE MINTY TO THE MAT!
I just-- I just don't know if I can do it.
Spiky Jon, you need to believe in yourself!
Try it again.
The Spiky Plex?
Yeah! It's a great move! You're great! Just--just give it another go! I'll even help!
Yes. With your powers combined, you cannot lose. It has been decided.
But--
IT HAS BEEN DECIDED! YOU WILL FIGHT AND YOU WILL WIN!
Okay! Okay, let's do this! 3...2...1...
Gooooo!
